        public void remove(int id)
        Removes a row from the supplier table. The row is specified by the id parameter which is a primary key in the table.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        id - id primary key field in the supplier table

      • removeAll

        public void removeAll()
        Deletes all rows from the supplier table. It only used for testing on the dummy database.

        Truncates the table and restarts it's primary key. Also it runs as cascaded, so it will delete all products associated with the suppliers. You should never-ever use it on the primary database! You have been warned!

        Specified by:
        removeAll in interface com.codecool.shop.dao.SupplierDao
